text: @TMobile @Tesla I would take her straight to Mt. Vernon NY and pull up to my Aunt's house. Covid-19 took her so fast, it's absolutely unbelievable. I would have to pull up to her home one S 5th Ave where the ambulance came and got her.  Never to be seen again...
